root.name: Danball Senki W
root.description: OverviewDanball Senki W is an action RPG, set in a future where the Little Battler eXperience, miniature mech duels, is a common pastime between kids. It is the first full sequel to the original PSP Danball Senki game.Coming out on both the Vita and the PSP, it is the first game published to support cross platform multiplayer between the two.
